spec_data.Name: php-pear-Net-SMTP
spec_data.Description:
Provides an implementation of the SMTP protocol using PEAR's Net_Socket class.

php-pear-Net-SMTP can optionally use package "php-pear-Auth-SASL".
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 08:32:20 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Provides an implementation of the SMTP protocol
